text: niccayamāka evarkaḷ taṅkaḷuṭaiya mārkkattai (tam viruppappaṭi palavāṟākap) pirittu, pala piriviṉarkaḷākap pirintu viṭṭaṉarō avarkaḷuṭaṉ (napiyē!) Umakku evvita campantamumillai avarkaḷuṭaiya viṣayamellām allāhviṭamē uḷḷatu - avarkaḷ ceytu koṇṭiruntavaṟṟaip paṟṟi muṭivil avaṉē avarkaḷukku aṟivippāṉ
